province_event = {
	id = es_archeology.1
	name = es_archeology.1.t
	test = es_archeology.1.d
	
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	
	option = {
		name = es_archeology.1.a
		
		random_list = {
			1 = { province_event = { id = es_archeology.2 days = 365 } add_province_flag = "es_artifacts_auriels_shield" }
		}
	}
}
province_event = {
	id = es_archeology.2
	name = es_archeology.2.t
	desc = es_archeology.2.d
	picture = {
		trigger = {
			continent = tamriel
			always = yes
		}
		picture = es_artifacts_auriels_shield
	}
	option = {
		name = es_archeology.2.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				continent = tamriel
				always = yes
			}
			add_ruler_modifier = es_artifacts_auriels_shield
			clr_province_flag = "es_artifacts_auriels_shield"
		}
	}
}
